title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes.
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: The day after the battle of Preston, the Chevaher slept at Pinkie House, nearMusselburgh; the next morning he returned to Duddingston, and entering thecapital, was received with the acclamations of the populace, and all the honourswhich the official authorities could render. Several proclamations were issuedupon his arrival, all of them adapted to influence the popular mind.
